% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}
	&&&& {(B,\beta)} \\
	\\
	{\coprod_{I}(T^{2}A_{i},\mu_{TA_{i}})} && {\coprod_{I}(TA_{i},\mu_{A_{i}})} && {(A,\alpha)} \\
	\\
	{(T^{2}A_{i},\mu_{TA_{i}})} && {(TA_{i},\mu_{A_{i}})} && {(A_{i},\alpha_{i})}
	\arrow[shift left, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[shift right, from=3-1, to=3-3]
	\arrow[two heads, from=3-3, to=3-5]
	\arrow[shift left, from=5-1, to=5-3]
	\arrow[shift right, from=5-1, to=5-3]
	\arrow["{\alpha_{i}}"', two heads, from=5-3, to=5-5]
	\arrow[from=5-1, to=3-1]
	\arrow[from=5-3, to=3-3]
	\arrow[from=5-5, to=3-5]
	\arrow[curve={height=18pt}, from=5-5, to=1-5]
	\arrow[from=3-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow[dashed, from=3-5, to=1-5]
\end{tikzcd}
